description: '''Electro house''' is a [[music genre|genre]] of [[electronic dance music]] and a subgenre of [[house music]] characterized by heavy [[Bass (sound)|bass]] and a [[tempo]] around 125â€“135 beats per minute. The term has been used to describe the music of many [[DJ Mag Top 100 DJs|''DJ Mag'' Top 100 DJs]], including [[Benny Benassi]], [[Skrillex]], [[Steve Aoki]], and [[Deadmau5]].
